solution_line_template: The cat got a {cat_headstart_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}=<<{cat_headstart_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}={cat_headstart_hours}>>{cat_headstart_hours} hour head start
The rabbit goes {rabbit_speed}-{cat_speed}=<<{rabbit_speed}-{cat_speed}={speed_difference}>>{speed_difference} mph faster than the cat
So it takes {cat_headstart_distance}/{speed_difference}=<<{cat_headstart_distance}/{speed_difference}={time_to_catch_up}>>{time_to_catch_up} hour for the rabbit to catch up
